name: Duchess
description: Elegant white Turkish Angora cat and mother of three kittens

name: Thomas O'Malley
description: Charming alley cat who helps Duchess and her kittens

name: Marie
description: White kitten with a pink bow, refined and proper

name: Berlioz
description: Gray kitten who loves to play piano

name: Toulouse
description: Orange kitten who aspires to be a painter like his owner

name: Edgar
description: The butler and main antagonist who plots against the cats

name: Roquefort
description: Brave mouse and friend to the aristocat family

name: Scat Cat
description: Leader of the alley cat jazz band and O'Malley's friend

name: Madame Adelaide Bonfamille
description: Wealthy elderly owner of Duchess and her kittens

name: Napoleon
description: Bloodhound who guards a farm with his friend Lafayette
